scripts.ci: dotnet r build && dotnet r test
scripts.publishRunDocs: dotnet r cleanRelease && dotnet r publishBlazorWasm  && dotnet r versionBlazor && cd Release/UIBlazor/wwwroot  &&  dotnet serve --path-base BlazorBrowserHistory  -o
scripts.publishRun: dotnet r cleanRelease && dotnet r publishBlazorWasm &&  cd Release/UIBlazor/wwwroot  &&  dotnet serve -o
